name: Temple Of Wanrum
description:
Ludum Dare Entry Page

Description:

You are an acolyte tasked with protecting the Temple of Wanrum. Destroy the legions of Undead seizing the temple using the powerful orb of magic.

Goal:

- Destroy as many skeletons as you can

- Collect magic crystals to boost your score and change magic attacks

- DO NOT under any circumstances allow the undead to reach the door to the Inner Temple

Controls:

- WASD to move around

- Space to jump and double jump

- LMB to shoot magic
